description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. When a former ally betrays your country, its up to you and your sword to set things right again! In this side scrolling hack and slash platformer, you will fight your way through nine levels of knights, wizards, and monsters as you uncover the truth and possibly even save the world if it's not too much trouble.
description.short: When a former ally betrays your country, its up to you and your sword to set things right again! In this side scrolling hack and slash platformer, you will fight your way through nine levels of knights, wizards, and monsters as you uncover the truth and possibly even save the world if it's not too much trouble.
